name: Wendy GLENN, Appellant, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY
name_abbreviation: Glenn v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

judges: Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Wendy GLENN, Appellant, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Anthony Witlin, F. Barbara Danien, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ronald A. White, Karen Spencer-Kelly, Philadelphia, for SEPTA.
Miriam B. Brenaman, Divisional Deputy-Appeals, Philadelphia, for amicus — City of Philadelphia.
Robert M. Brown, Scott D. Cessar, Pittsburgh, for amicus — Port Authority of Allegheny County.
casebody.head_matter:
585 A.2d 463
Wendy GLENN, Appellant, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 15, 1991.
Decided Feb. 6, 1991.
Anthony Witlin, F. Barbara Danien, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Ronald A. White, Karen Spencer-Kelly, Philadelphia, for SEPTA.
Miriam B. Brenaman, Divisional Deputy-Appeals, Philadelphia, for amicus — City of Philadelphia.
Robert M. Brown, Scott D. Cessar, Pittsburgh, for amicus — Port Authority of Allegheny County.
Before LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
